item.title: NASDAQ CEO Says Blockchain Technology is Impressive, Not Always Suitable - NEWSBTC
item.description:
NASDAQ CEO Says Blockchain Technology is Impressive, Not Always Suitable - NEWSBTC

The blockchain technology based solution used by Nasdaq to settle trades has very less capacity compared to actual trade volumes handled by the market. Read more... Nasdaq CEO Robert Greifeld, in his recent comment, has mentioned that the bitcoin blockchain may not be the ideal system to be implemented for the automated trade settlement system.

item.title: Chinese Bitcoin Mining Firm Canaan Acquired for $422 Million
item.description:
Chinese Bitcoin Mining Firm Canaan Acquired for $422 Million

C hinese bitcoin mining firm Canaan Creative (more commonly known by its brand Avalon), is being acquired for a reportedly princely sum of Â¥3.06bn, approximately $466 million. It makes for a notable business deal in the bitcoin mining industry, perhaps the most notable yet.

item.title: Bitcoin VC Tim Draper: Blockchain is the Perfect Bureaucrat
item.description:
Bitcoin VC Tim Draper: Blockchain is the Perfect Bureaucrat

CoinTelegraph spoke to Tim Draper at Arctic15 about how Blockchain and Bitcoin are changing everything in our lives, and also what the billionaire VC is actually doing with his thousands of Bitcoin. Tim Draper is known for being the 'Nostradamus' of the markets with an incredible track record of correctly predicting the future.

item.title: Help Fund The First Cryptocurrency Scholarship
item.description:
Help Fund The First Cryptocurrency Scholarship

Cryptocurrency enthusiasts are always looking for ways to create completely different projects than what people would expect. One of these projects revolves around creating the world's first cryptocurrency-funded scholarship. The goal would be to fund students so they can attend a university of their choice in Europe.

item.title: Ver, Voorhees Combat Bitcoin's Reddit-culous Censorship
item.description:
Ver, Voorhees Combat Bitcoin's Reddit-culous Censorship

Censorship and disillusionment were two major topics of conversation when Roger Ver and Erik Voorhees met to discuss the future of Bitcoin live this week. Also read: Konrad S. Graf: Bitcoin Block Size Political Economy The two industry pioneers, who first met in fall 2011 when bitcoin was worth $8, were speaking on a special edition of the Liberty Entrepreneurs Podcast devoted to the topic.

item.title: An Interview With the Hacker Probably Selling Your Password Right Now
item.description:
An Interview With the Hacker Probably Selling Your Password Right Now

For the last two weeks, the tech world's security teams have been practically under siege. On an almost daily basis, new collections of data from hundreds of millions of stolen accounts have appeared on the dark web, ripped from major web firms and sold for as little as a few hundred dollars each worth of bitcoins.

item.title: Blockchain Beyond Cryptocurrency: A Brief Guide to the Future Part I
item.description:
Blockchain Beyond Cryptocurrency: A Brief Guide to the Future Part I

Using blockchain technology apart from its original application, cryptocurrency, isn't news any longer. Numerous projects around the globe come up with new ideas as to how distributed ledger technology may be applicable beyond just transacting values.

item.title: What will be the impact of bitcoins?
item.description:
What will be the impact of bitcoins?

Answer: The year 2016 will see twofold reduction in mining rewards for a found block. The overall supply of bitcoins is finite, and comprises 21 million coins. A coin first sees the light every time a miner solves a block. The bitcoin protocol dictates that the quantity of bitcoins used as a rew...

item.title: New Head of Russian Blockchain Community Reveals its Plans
item.description:
New Head of Russian Blockchain Community Reveals its Plans

June 6, the position of Blockchain.community's board chairman, previously occupied by Alex Fork, was taken by Artem Tolkachev, the managing partner at law firm Tolkachev & Partners and expert in legal regulation of cryptotechnologies. ForkLog talked with the newly elected chairman to find out more about the organization's plans and objectives.

item.title: Blockchain Technology: How are transactions verified/ blocks secured?
item.description:
Blockchain Technology: How are transactions verified/ blocks secured?

1 person wants answers to this question. Be the first to answer.
